    level="1"
    right="Item 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Vine of Roses](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1384)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Good" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=83" />
<trait label="Light" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=100" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 85

**Price** 600 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Spiked Chain](/Weapons.aspx?ID=60)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [disrupting](/Equipment.aspx?ID=294) [spiked chain](/Weapons.aspx?ID=60)_ comes in a rich, green color with rose petals painted on the handle in varying shades of red and pink. The chain seems to banish nearby shadows.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> Interact;     **Effect** You hold the chain out before you, and the weapon glows as bright as a [torch](/Equipment.aspx?ID=60). You can suppress this light by Activating the weapon again.

**Activate** <actions string="Reaction" /> envision;  **Frequency** once per day; **Trigger** You critically succeed at a Strike against a [fiend](/Traits.aspx?ID=70) or [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160);  **Effect** The weapon unleashes its light in an attempt to destroy the target. The _vine of roses_ casts a 3rd-level [_searing light_](/Spells.aspx?ID=269) spell with the triggering creature as the target. In place of a spell attack roll, make a weapon attack roll with the _vine of roses_ using the same multiple attack penalty as the triggering Strike.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
